p: Neuropsychological test battery (based on NACC-Uniform Data Set Version 3): Montreal Cognitive Assessment, Number Span Test Forward and Backward, Category Fluency for animals and vegetables, Craft Story21 immediate and delayed recall, Benson Complex Figure Immediate and Delayed Recall, Trail Making A and B, Multilingual Naming Test, Verbal Fluency F and L. 45 This test battery is given for diagnostic purposes at baseline, 52 and 78 weeks.
